item.name: Get Cities (modified GET request header 'Accept' parameter to accept xml content response)

response.name: Get Cities (from local datastore with all points of interest)
response.body:
<ArrayOfCityDto xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/CityInfo.API.Models">
    <CityDto>
        <Description>City with a lot of people</Description>
        <Id>1</Id>
        <Name>NYC</Name>
        <PointsOfInterest>
            <PointOfInterestDto>
                <Description>Big park</Description>
                <Id>1</Id>
                <Name>Central Park</Name>
            </PointOfInterestDto>
            <PointOfInterestDto>
                <Description>Tall building</Description>
                <Id>2</Id>
                <Name>Empire State</Name>
            </PointOfInterestDto>
        </PointsOfInterest>
    </CityDto>
    <CityDto>
        <Description>Ancient City</Description>
        <Id>2</Id>
        <Name>Athens</Name>
        <PointsOfInterest>
            <PointOfInterestDto>
                <Description>Ancient temple</Description>
                <Id>1</Id>
                <Name>Parthenon</Name>
            </PointOfInterestDto>
            <PointOfInterestDto>
                <Description>Center of the city</Description>
                <Id>2</Id>
                <Name>Acropolis</Name>
            </PointOfInterestDto>
        </PointsOfInterest>
    </CityDto>
    <CityDto>
        <Description>City with Eiffel Tower</Description>
        <Id>3</Id>
        <Name>Paris</Name>
        <PointsOfInterest>
            <PointOfInterestDto>
                <Description>Tall tower</Description>
                <Id>1</Id>
                <Name>Eiffel Tower</Name>
            </PointOfInterestDto>
            <PointOfInterestDto>
                <Description>World's biggest museum</Description>
                <Id>2</Id>
                <Name>Louvre Museum</Name>
            </PointOfInterestDto>
        </PointsOfInterest>
    </CityDto>
</ArrayOfCityDto>

response.name: Get Cities (from database without points of interest)
response.body:
<ArrayOfCityWithoutPointsOfInterestDto xmlns:i="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/CityInfo.API.Models">
    <CityWithoutPointsOfInterestDto>
        <Description>Ancient City</Description>
        <Id>2</Id>
        <Name>Athens</Name>
    </CityWithoutPointsOfInterestDto>
    <CityWithoutPointsOfInterestDto>
        <Description>City with a lot of people</Description>
        <Id>1</Id>
        <Name>NYC</Name>
    </CityWithoutPointsOfInterestDto>
    <CityWithoutPointsOfInterestDto>
        <Description>City with Eiffel Tower</Description>
        <Id>3</Id>
        <Name>Paris</Name>
    </CityWithoutPointsOfInterestDto>
</ArrayOfCityWithoutPointsOfInterestDto>
